SELECT cd.dish_id, cd.shop_id, shop_name, save_path, dish_name, dish_type, supply_time, is_sale, label, original_price, current_price, vip_price, SUM(cdo.dish_id) AS sale_count, cd.create_at, cd.update_at FROM czb_dish cd LEFT JOIN czb_shop cs ON cs.shop_id = cd.shop_id LEFT JOIN czb_file cf ON cd.file_id = cf.file_id LEFT JOIN czb_dish_order cdo ON cd.dish_id = cdo.dish_id WHERE is_recommend = 1 GROUP BY cd.dish_id order BY SUM(cdo.dish_id) DESC
LIMIT 6

SELECT cs.shop_id AS shopId, cs.user_id AS userId, shop_name as shopName, shop_phone AS shopPhone, shop_content AS shopContent, shop_address AS shopAddress, cs.create_at AS createAt, cs.update_at AS updateAt, audit AS audit, shop_type AS shopType, longitude AS longitude, latitude AS latitude, starting_time_business AS startingTimeBusiness, end_time_business AS endTimeBusiness, shop_img shopImg, save_path AS savePath, count(cdo.shop_id) AS saleCount, ROUND( 6371.393 * 2 * ASIN( SQRT( POW( SIN( ( #{longitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE} * 3.1415926 / 180 - latitude * PI() / 180 ) / 2 ), 2 ) + COS(#{longitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE} * 3.1415926 / 180) * COS(latitude * PI() / 180) * POW( SIN( ( #{latitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE} * 3.1415926 / 180 - longitude * PI() / 180 ) / 2 ), 2 ) ) ), 2 ) AS distance FROM czb_shop cs LEFT JOIN czb_file cf ON cs.shop_img = cf.file_id LEFT JOIN czb_dish_order cdo ON (cs.shop_id = cdo.shop_id AND date_format(cdo.create_at,'%Y-%m') = date_format(NOW(),'%Y-%m')) WHERE shop_type = 2 and audit = 1 GROUP BY cs.shop_id
ORDER BY distance ASC
ORDER BY saleCount DESC
